1.text: Bring water to a boil and let it cool to around 175 °F (79 °C).

2.text: Place 1 tea bag in your teacup.

3.text: Pour 1 cup (240 ml) of hot water over the tea bag.

4.text: Steep the tea for 2 to 3 minutes.

5.text: Remove the tea bag and sip the green tea.

7.text: Place 1 teaspoon (2 g) of loose-leaf green tea into a small teapot.

8.text: Pour 3⁄4 cup (180 ml) of the hot water over the leaves.

9.text: Steep the green tea for 1 to 2 minutes.

10.text: Strain the leaves or remove the infuser basket and drink the tea.

11.text: Place a fine mesh strainer over a matcha tea bowl.

12.text: Sift 1 1/2 teaspoons (2 g) of matcha powder into the tea bowl.

13.text: Bring water to a boil and let it cool to between 180 and 190 °F (82 and 88 °C).

14.text: Pour 1⁄4 cup (59 ml) of the hot water into the tea bowl.

15.text: Whisk the mixture for 20 to 60 seconds to make matcha green tea.

16.text: Sip the matcha green tea while it's hot.
